name: Crypt of the Necro Dicer
description:
Made from scratch for the GMTK game jam 2022 in 48h.

Fight your way through endless dungeon rooms in the turn based strategy dungeon crawler.

The twist? You get a random number of moves between 1 and 6 each turn and you HAVE to use them all because wasting is bad. At least that is what my mum told me.

Controls:
arrows to move, backspace to undo move, return to end turn. Attack by moving into an enemy.

Credits: Yvouilles, Nini and Sofiane.

Music: Banadium by Nini (only thing made before the jam)
